backend/main.mo: Defines program, KPI, user, and agenda types with comparison utilities and integrates authorization via access control state.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of multiple frontend files for documentation or planning purposes.
frontend/index.css: Sets Tailwind base layers and color variables for light and dark themes using OKLCH values.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component managing authentication, profile setup flow, theming, and loading states.
frontend/src/components/DashboardOvervie: Renders dashboard metrics and charts by aggregating program and KPI data with loading placeholders.
frontend/src/components/DeleteConfirmDia: Reusable confirmation dialog for delete actions using alert-dialog components.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying attribution and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header component showing logo, theme toggle, and user menu with logout and profile info.
frontend/src/components/KpiFormDialog.ts: Dialog form for creating or editing a KPI, mapping form fields to backend structures and submitting mutations.
frontend/src/components/KPIsTab.tsx: Displays KPI list with filters, edit/delete actions, and modal handling for creating or editing KPIs.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting new users to enter their name and role, then saving the profile via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/program-calendar: Renders a legend showing color indicators for calendar item categories.
Provides color mapping and daily counting logic for programs, agenda items, and KPIs.
React error boundary that catches rendering errors in the calendar tab and shows a resettable fallback UI.
Renders a single calendar day cell with date, visual category indicators, and density-based styling.
Displays a slide-in detail panel listing all programs occurring on a selected day with metadata and click handling.
UI toggle allowing users to switch between comfortable and compact grid spacing modes.
Switches calendar view modes (month, week, day, agenda) using a button group.
Drawer showing detailed program information including status, timeline, PIC, and optional edit controls.
Implements filter logic for programs and counts programs active on a specific day.
Maps program status and priority values to display labels and style configurations.
Generates a 14-day agenda list grouping programs, agenda items, and KPI deadlines by day.
Renders a detailed day view listing programs, agenda items, and KPI deadlines filtered to the selected date with click handling.
Builds a monthly calendar grid and displays per‑day counts of programs, agenda items, and KPIs using DayCell components.
Displays a weekly calendar grid with weekday labels and per‑day item counts through DayCell components.
frontend/src/components/ProgramCalendarT: Main calendar view with month/week/day/agenda modes, program filtering, reminders, and program detail/editing support.
frontend/src/components/ProgramFormDialo: Dialog form for creating or editing programs, handling division-based PIC selection and submitting mutations.
frontend/src/components/programs/Program: Creates an interactive program card showing details, status, priority, and edit/delete actions.
frontend/src/components/ProgramsTab.tsx: Displays and filters programs with search, sorting, CRUD actions, and detail drawer support.
frontend/src/components/RelatedProgramCo: Provides a searchable combobox to select a related program from a list.
frontend/src/components/ReportsTab.tsx: Generates program or KPI reports with filters and CSV export functionality.
frontend/src/components/TeamMemberFormDi: Dialog form for creating or editing a team member with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/TeamMembersTab.t: Lists team members with search, filters, and CRUD actions depending on user permissions.
Admin-only interface to view and update user roles with loading and access handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when the identity changes.
Periodically checks upcoming programs, agenda items, and KPIs to show 24‑hour and 3‑hour toast reminders with deduping.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login state, loading stored identities, handling login/logout, and exposing identity context.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaQuery.ts: Returns whether a given CSS media query matches, updating reactively on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks wrapping backend actor calls for user profiles, admin actions, and program queries including date‑range filtering.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base and utility layers defining theme variables, dark mode, gradients, animations, and component styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and loading the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard page with tabbed navigation showing program, KPI, calendar, team, reports, and admin user sections based on caller admin status.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page using Internet Identity to authenticate users, displaying a card with a login button and loading state.
frontend/src/utils/reminderDedup.ts: Utility for deduplicating reminder notifications using timestamped localStorage records with automatic expiry cleanup.
frontend/src/utils/safeBrowserStorage.ts: Safe wrappers around localStorage for JSON, strings, and removal with error handling and SSR fallback.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: URL and session-storage utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing parameters from query strings and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended colors, radius, shadows, animations, and typography/container-query plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the current project state for a redesigned Program Calendar UI, including goals, architectural notes, known issues, and existing features.
